block.title: SignalFx Forwarder
block.text: Configure the app to send to your SignalFx organization

block.title: SignalFx Token
block.text: Find your access token in the SignalFx application by navigating to Organization Settings => Access Tokens.

block.title: Realms, Ingest URL, and you
block.text:
By default, this add-on will send to the us0 realm (https://ingest.us0.signalfx.com). To determine what realm you are in, check your profile page in the SignalFx web application (click the avatar in the upper right and click My Profile).
If you set a realm, you do not need to set an ingest URL value. If you provide an ingest url, this url will override any realm passed. This is useful if you are not sending data to SignalFx ingest, such as a SignalFx Gateway.
